sentences.en: "I'll talk to you on Friday anyway."— 'Yep. Okay then.'
sentences.cn: “不管怎样，我星期五和你谈。”——“行，就这么定了。”

sentences.en: "Shall I give you a ring on Friday?" — "Yeah okay."
sentences.cn: “我星期五给你打电话好吗？”——“好的。”

sentences.en: A brain scan last Friday finally set his mind at rest.
sentences.cn: 上周五的脑部扫描终于让他放心了。

sentences.en: By Friday at 5:30 p.m., I still hadn't heard from Lund.
sentences.cn: 直到周五下午5点半，我仍未收到伦德的消息。
星期五黛安娜不来这里。

sentences.en: Flying out on Friday from Gatwick it took seven hours door-to-door.
sentences.cn: 星期五从盖特威克起飞全程需要7个小时。

sentences.en: He fled on Friday, saying he feared for his life.
sentences.cn: 他星期五逃走了，说是担心自己有生命危险。

sentences.en: He weighed in on Friday night at around 19 stone.
sentences.cn: 他在周五的晚上称了体重，大约是19英石。

sentences.en: His shop is open Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm.
sentences.cn: 他的店周一到周五、每天上午9点到下午6点对外营业。

sentences.en: I shall be 26 years old on Friday next.
Mr Cook is intending to go to the Middle East on Friday.
sentences.cn: 库克先生打算周五去中东。

sentences.en: Police skirmished with youths on the estate last Friday.
sentences.cn: 上周五警方与一些青年在住宅区发生了冲突。

sentences.en: She arranged an appointment for Friday afternoon at four-fifteen.
sentences.cn: 她在星期五下午4点15分安排了一次会面。

sentences.en: So the upshot is we're going for lunch on Friday.
sentences.cn: 结果是我们周五一起去吃午餐。

sentences.en: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened.
sentences.cn: 除非受恶劣天气干扰，南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

sentences.en: They meet here every Friday morning.
sentences.cn: 他们每周五早晨在这里会面。

phrases.tran_cn: 黑色星期五；耶稣受难日
[宗]耶稣受难日（复活节前的星期五）

trans.tran_en: the day between Thursday and Saturday
the day between Thursday and Saturday
